official-title.#text:
To prohibit the implementation or enforcement of any
		  requirement of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act until
		  certifications are made that taxpayer information is not and will not be used
		  for targeting any individual or group that provides information to the Internal
		  Revenue Service for political reasons or on the basis of political views, and
		  for other purposes.
